name: HSP_ACCOUNT_5
description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. It excludes Professional Billing HARs created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas. This fourth hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT, HSP_ACCOUNT_2, HSP_ACCOUNT_3, and HSP_ACCOUNT_4.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the hospital account record.

columns.name: AR_CLASSIFICATION_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the A/R classification of this account.
